course.title: CSI 4125 Theory of Programming Languages (3 units)
course.desc: The concept of formal semantics. Attribute grammars. Denotational semantics. Operational semantics. Axiomatic semantics. Lambda-calculus for programming language description. Resolution and the semantics of logic programming. Theory of abstract data types. Concurrent programming, process algebras, CCS, CSP.Course Component: LecturePrerequisites: CSI 3104, CSI 3120.
